# Unit 1

In this unit, we will cover how to transform and wrangle network data. By the end of this unit you will:

1.  Understand how network data is structured

2.  Know how to bring network data into RStudio

3.  Know how to clean network data

4.  Learn the difference between one and two mode networks

## Project Milestones
